certificate_name: Export dogs from United Kingdom to Australia

pages.title: What are the details of the dog?
What are the details of the microchip?

content.header: What are the details of the microchip?

fields.label: Site of the microchip on the body
fields.name: microchip_body

fields.label: Date of final examination and microchip scanning
fields.hint: This must be within 5 days of export, enter in format DD/MM/YYYY
fields.name: microchip_date

fields.label: Address of the dog at time of export
fields.name: owner_address
fields.default: Highland Riding Centre, AddressBorlum Farm, Inverness, IV63 6X

pages.title: What is your import permit number?

content.header: What is your import permit number?

fields.label: Who is sending the dog?
fields.hint: Provide details of the person who will send the consignment, or their representative
fields.name: consignee_details
fields.default: ABC HORSES LTD, 24 edendhurst ave, London, SW6 5EU

fields.label: Flight number
fields.hint: You can enter more than one flight number
fields.name: flight_number
fields.default: ABC HORSES LTD, 24 edendhurst ave, London, SW6 5EU

fields.label: Who is receiving the dog?
fields.hint: Provide Name and address of the person (consignee) the dog will be shipped to, or their representative
fields.name: consignee_details
fields.default: ABC HORSES LTD, 24 edendhurst ave, London, SW6 5EU

pages.title: In which region will the certification take place?

content.header: In which region will the certification take place?
content.paragraph: Enter details of all premises where the horse has been resident in the last 60 days. We use this information to help control the spread of disease.

fields.label: Certification region
fields.hint: Select the region in which the certification will take place:
fields.name: certification_place

pages.title: Has the animal been resident in Great Britain for the last 12 months?

content.header: Has the animal been resident in Great Britain for the last 12 months?
content.paragraph: Enter details of all premises where the horse has been resident in the last 60 days. We use this information to help control the spread of disease.

fields.label: Resident in GB for last 12 months
fields.name: is_resident_gb

fields.label: Addresses in the last 12 months
fields.hint: If you have answered no to the question above, list the countries and addresses of all places where the animal has been resident in the last 12 months
fields.name: exporter_name

content.paragraph: If you are the exporter, provide your name or business name. If you are an agent representing someone else, provide their name or business name.

pages.title: What is the planned date of export?

content.header: What is the planned date of export?
content.paragraph: This is the date that the consignment leaves the loading premises  This may not the same date that it leaves the UK.  For block applications, enter the estimated date that the first export is likely to take place.
